sentence: EXCLUSIVE Rep. Madison Cawthorn may have violated federal insider trading laws as he hyped up an alleged pump-and-dump cryptocurrency scheme, multiple watchdog groups told the Washington Examiner.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Madison Cawthorn implicated in potential insider trading scheme, experts say

sentence: Topline Sen. Thom Tillis called Wednesday for the House Ethics Committee to investigate fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn after watchdog agencies told the Washington Examiner the congressman could be implicated in an insider trading schemethe latest in a series of scandals for Cawthorn.
author: Anna Kaplan
title: Sen. Tillis Calls For Insider Trading Probe Over Rep. Cawthorn's Ties To Let's Go Brandon' Meme Coin

sentence: Speculation that the Republican Party may be trying to purge Representative Madison Cawthorn from Congress has intensified after the North Carolina congressman was embroiled in yet another potential scandal.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Is Madison Cawthorn Being Purged by Republicans?

sentence: Just In... Sen. Thom Tillis called on the House Ethics Committee to investigate allegations that his fellow North Carolina Republican, Rep. Madison Cawthorn, engaged in an insider trading scheme.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Thom Tillis calls for investigation into Madison Cawthorn insider trading allegations

sentence: ICYMI Cawthorn's bad news cycle: Some watchdog groups raised concerns that North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn may have violated insider trading laws when he hyped the Let's Go Brandon? cryptocurrency on Instagram the day before it announced a sponsorship deal with the NASCAR driver Brandon Brown and its value spiked.
author:
Stephanie Akin
Kate Ackley
Mary Ellen McIntire
title: At the Races: Signs of red ahead

sentence: Just In... Sen. Thom Tillis has unleashed a fresh round of attacks on his fellow North Carolina Republican lawmaker, Rep. Madison Cawthorn.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Thom Tillis continues attacks on fellow North Carolina Republican Madison Cawthorn

sentence: It appears both Democrats and Republicans are ready for Representative Madison Cawthorn, who has been on a truly remarkable scandal spree in recent months, to be held accountable forone of his many potential crimes.
author: Caleb Ecarma
title: Madison Cawthorn Keeps Getting Implicated in Possible Crimes
